TopicTitle: Ok so the REALLY big wheels

Articles.Content:
I am trying to make a large fuel conveyor for my Kethane factory On Duna, but I can't keep the large wheels from the rover pack to stay on. No matter how clow I move, how many struts i use the things just snap off at the first hint of terrain.

What haulers have other people managed?

Alacrity Fitz

Here's my Heavy Mobile Mining Rig. The HMMR or HAMMER.

I don't know if this is wins the biggest but I'd rank it in the top 10 maybe top 5?

I think 10~12 is safest top speed on level terrain. 3~5 when you approach an incline.

Click on pic to view mission album:
